conversation.text: For a war movie with an Iraq connection, I recommend 'The Deer Hunter'. This film explores the impact of the Vietnam War on a group of friends, including an RAF pilot involved in an Iraqi conflict. Starring Christopher Walken and Robert De Niro, 'The Deer Hunter' provides a poignant glimpse into the wartime experiences of those from different sides of the conflict.
